data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Panorpa (Mecoptera, Panorpidae) from eastern China and a new synonym

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Ji-Shen, Gao, Xiao-Tong, Hua, Bao-Zhen (2019): Two new species of the genus Panorpa (Mecoptera, Panorpidae) from eastern China and a new synonym. ZooKeys 874: 149-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.874.36314, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.874.36314
